description.english: Become the World Boss.
Delete a player with a headshot.
Delete two or more players within a short amount of time.
Delete three or more players within a short amount of time.
Delete four or more players within a short amount of time.
Delete five or more players within a short amount of time.
Delete six or more players within a short amount of time.
Delete a player after multiple deaths in a row.
Delete a player from over 50 meters.
Delete a player on a killstreak.
Delete the player that last killed you.
Delete the World Boss.
Delete another Gladiator whilst the World Boss is Corrupting the server.
Lose all of your lives and reset to Level 1.
Stop the World Boss from Corrupting a HEX.
Corrupt the entire server.
Reach level 25.
Delete the World Boss with a melee.
Delete a player with Mini-Nuke.
Delete a player whilst in Last Chance.
Corrupt a HEX.
Demote another player.
Become the World Boss 100 times.
Delete 250 players with a headshot.
Stop the World Boss from Corrupting a HEX 25 times.
Corrupt the entire server 10 times.
Delete 250 Players with the Shotgun.
Delete 250 Players with the Assualt Rifle.
Delete 250 Players with the Burst Rifle.
Delete 250 Players with the Pistol.
Delete 250 Players with the Revolver.
Delete 250 Players with the Marksman Rifle.
Delete 250 Players with the Rocket Launcher.
Delete 250 Players with the Sniper Rifle.
Delete 250 Players with the SMG.
Delete 250 Players with the LAZARBEAM.
Delete 100 Players.
Delete 1,000 Players.
Delete 5,000 Players.
Delete 10,000 Players.
Earn 100 Boss Bucks.
Earn 1,000 Boss Bucks.
Earn 5,000 Boss Bucks.
Earn 10,000 Boss Bucks.
Equip a Shotgun with Level 3 Spread Decrease.
Equip a Jetpack, Hover and Level 3 Airborne Aggression at the same time.
Equip Refuel and Level 3 Reload Speed at the same time.
Equip Impulse Punch, Level 3 Long Arms and Level 3 Heavy Hitter at the same time.
Equip a Speed Tread with Level 3 Fast Feet at the same time.
Equip a Shotgun with Ratman and Active Camo at the same time.
Equip a Sniper Rifle with Level 3 Quick Scope.
Equip Explosive Magazines and Level 3 Reload Speed at the same time.
Equip What a Rush and Level 3 More Ammo at the same time.
Equip Level 3 Juicy Gems and Level 3 Gem Magnet at the same time.
Equip Energised and Ignition at the same time.
Equip Level 3 Multi-Jump and Level 3 Air Dash at the same time.
Destroy 100 Generators.
Destroy 100 Drones.
Delete 50 players with a Grenade.
Delete 50 players with a Firebomb.
Delete 50 players with a Tesla Coil.
Delete 50 players with an Energy Bomb.
Use a Man Cannon 100 times.
Die by falling off of the edge.
Corrupt a HEX 50 times.
Complete all active Daily Challenges.
Complete all active Weekly Challenges.
Destroy a Drone with a Melee.
Select 10 purple upgrades in a build.
Select 10 orange upgrades in a build.
Select 10 blue upgrades in a build.
Select 10 red upgrades in a build.
Select 10 green upgrades in a build.
Reach Level 25 after Prestiging 3 times.
Leave a server after deleting at least 25 players.
Leave a server after deleting at least 50 players.
Leave a server after deleting at least 75 players.
Leave a server after deleting at least 100 players.
Delete a player from a Supercharged explosion.
Equip an item.
Purchase an item from the store.
Delete the World Boss 100 times.
Delete 100 players from over 50 meters.
